# Textual

> Textual is a TUI framework for Python, inspired by modern web development.

Visit textual.textualize.io for more information.

## Documentation

- [Introduction](https://textual.textualize.io/getting_started/)
- [Tutorial](https://textual.textualize.io/tutorial/): Step-by-step tutorials
- [Guide](https://textual.textualize.io/guide/): Comprehensive guides
- [Reference](https://textual.textualize.io/reference/)
- [API](https://textual.textualize.io/api/)
- [How To](https://textual.textualize.io/how-to/)
- [Devtools](https://textual.textualize.io/guide/devtools/)
- [App Basics](https://textual.textualize.io/guide/app/)
- [Styles](https://textual.textualize.io/guide/styles/)
- [Textual CSS](https://textual.textualize.io/guide/CSS/)

## Main

- [Home](https://textual.textualize.io/)
- [Widgets](https://textual.textualize.io/widget_gallery/)
- [Roadmap](https://textual.textualize.io/roadmap/)
- [CSS Types](https://textual.textualize.io/css_types/)

- [<integer>](https://textual.textualize.io/css_types/integer/)
- [<keyline>](https://textual.textualize.io/css_types/keyline/)
